type CustomLineCap = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface ICloneable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝自訂的使用者定義線條端點。

span.span: Encapsulates a custom user-defined line cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 線條端點會用在開始與結束的線條或曲線 GDI + 繪製物件。Line caps are used at the beginnings and ends of lines or curves drawn by GDI+ objects. GDI + 支援數個預先定義的端點樣式，而且也可讓使用者定義自己的端點樣式。GDI+ supports several predefined cap styles, and also allows users to define their own cap styles. 這個類別用來建立自訂帽緣樣式。This class is used to create custom cap styles. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 若要執行此範例中貼上]、 [Windows 表單將程式碼。To run this example paste, the code into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件，並呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的外框和填滿。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的外框和填滿。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論作業為指定的填滿模式中使用 「 捲繞"填滿模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`將會被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`已`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要執行此範例中，程式碼貼到 Windows 表單上。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件，並呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified existing enumeration with the specified outline and fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論作業為指定的填滿模式中使用 「 捲繞"填滿模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`將會被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`已`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論作業為指定的填滿模式中使用 「 捲繞"填滿模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`將會被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`已`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.

span.span: The enumeration this object uses to join lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定列舉型別，用來聯結線條和曲線的繪製的路徑所組成物件。This property specifies a enumeration that is used to join lines and curves that make up the stroked path of this object.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來縮放這個數量類別物件寬度相關的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount by which to scale this Class object with respect to the width of the object.
The amount by which to scale the cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定所要乘以的自訂端點大小的畫筆寬度的倍數。This property specifies the multiple of the pen width by which to multiply the size of the custom cap. 例如，如果此屬性等於 1 時，自訂端點寬度為 10、 自訂帽緣高度為 5，而且寬度為 3 的畫筆繪製線條，然後的上限是繪製 30 單位寬度和 15 單位的高度。For example, if this property equals 1, the custom cap width is 10, the custom cap height is 5, and a line is drawn with a pen with a width of 3, then the cap is drawn 30 units wide and 15 units high. 將此屬性設定為 3，會導致要繪製的 90 單位寬和高 45 單位的上限。Setting this property to 3 causes the cap to be drawn 90 units wide and 45 units high.
